news.title: Lunar New Years Sale!
news.body:
## Happy Lunar New Years!
We here at Astro Games are thrilled to announce a sale in celebration of the year of the Rabbit, take a look at all discounts available here
In game **La Tale**
- **30%** off dragon themed items
- **new** rabbit emblem
- **new** rabbit cloak
- **removed** all unnecessary predators

Looking forward to seeing everyone in game, we've seen more players than ever in the **US-east** region, so they're getting **double xp** weekend!

news.title: Zisk Plains Content Update
news.body:
## New Content Update

### New Area

- Zisk Plains
- Can be accessed through the portal in White Cole Canyon 5.

### New Scenario Quests

- Available to characters above Ascension level 1600.
- Only available to those who have completed the previous scenario quest: [The End of a Kingdom].

### New Instance Dungeons

- Void Star [* Lv. 1600+]
- Entry Count (Daily): 2
- 2-Man Time Attack Instance Dungeon

- Oblivion Lake [* Lv. 1700+]
- Entry Count (Daily): 1
- 6-Man Instance Dungeon
